item.description:
Hi Incubators!

My apologies for not sending this out sooner, but Incubator will be happening Thursday at Somerville Theater in the form of an improv show!  Rocket Surgery, a local improv troupe featuring a huge bunch of our incubators has a show at 8pm!!  Best of all its only $5!! And it features a huge host of amazing improv comedy!!  Its hosted by Somerville's own Awkward Compliment.

So come on out and bring the support!!

 

Somerville Theater is right off the red line in Davis Square! 8pm.  Hope to see you there!

Cheers,

Jason
item.why: Some of our incubators have a show!!
item.name: Change: Incubator at Somvervile Theater for a show!!
